name: Blockz VS Ballz
description: This is a symbiosis of several games. Collect balls in the squad and attack the cubes. The more blocks the squad wins, the more points the player gains. Play without any sounds and music. Just relax while controlling the balls.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer: 32bit / 64bit Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 45 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM Storage: 45 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
